hero_title:
We don't build sites.
We build Revenue Engines.
hero_desc: I specialize in High-Converting Landing Pages. If you are spending on ads but not selling, your site is the problem. Let me audit your strategy and scale your revenue.
problem_desc: Most agencies build 'pretty' sites. I build sites that work. My approach is technical and psychological.
card_1_desc: I design every section with neuro-sales to guide the user towards purchase friction-free.
card_2_desc: I don't just deliver code. I advise you on how to structure your offer to make it irresistible.
card_3_desc: We optimize every line of code. A slow site kills sales. Mine fly.
cta_mid_btn: I Want a Sales Landing Page
cases_desc: Brands that trusted my consulting and now lead their niche.
final_cta_desc: I only work with brands committed to growth. If that's you, let's talk.
footer_txt: Specialist in Web Development and Conversion Strategies.
